name: getMetadata
description: This method returns metadata that was previously stored with setMetadata.

parameters.name: peerId
parameters.description: The ID of the peer for which you want to get the metadata

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The serial number and channel of the device for which you want to get the metadata (separated by a colon)

parameters.name: dataId
parameters.description: The data ID as defined in setMetadata
